messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Large amounts of linking bluespace activity detected on Lavaland and the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown magical entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Seems like another station is getting close to ours. There is a teleporter pad in dorms if you wanna go to the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Teleporter Room.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: There is a fucking huge hole in the supermatter chamber.
